data.event: In 2015, Forbes put Los Altos (ZIP codes 94022 and 94024) as the 11th and 57th most expensive ZIP codes in the United States.

event.title: formed the Altos Land Company in 1906

data.event: Paul Shoup, an executive of the Southern Pacific Railroad, and his colleagues formed the Altos Land Company in 1906 and started the development of Los Altos.
It continued a train a day operation to and from San Francisco.
